TestInfo.Body: { "Action": "Update", "TenantName": "IDP", "Entity": "SalesTerritory", "Data": { "Code": "MT", "Name": "Kênh thương mại điện tử", "CountryCode": "VN", "Channel": "MT", "Active": "Y", "Status": "R", "EmployeeCode": "EMP003", "SalesTerritoryHierarchy": [ { "Code": "MT", "LineId": "1", "Level": "0", "LevelCode": "SubCountry", "LevelName": "SubCountry", "Active": "Y", "ParentCode": null, "LastLevel": "N", "PositionName": "Phụ trách SubCountry", "IsSalesGroup": "N" }, { "Code": "MT", "LineId": "2", "Level": "1", "LevelCode": "Region", "LevelName": "Region", "Active": "Y", "ParentCode": "SubCountry", "LastLevel": "Y", "PositionName": "Phụ trách Region", "IsSalesGroup": "N" } ], "SaleTerritoryValues": [ { "Code": "MT", "LineId": "1", "Level": "0", "ValueCode": "MN", "ValueName": "Miền Nam", "Active": "Y", "ParentCode": null, "LastLevel": "N" }, { "Code": "MT", "LineId": "2", "Level": "1", "ValueCode": "HCM", "ValueName": "Hồ Chí Minh", "Active": "Y", "ParentCode": "MN", "LastLevel": "Y" } ], "SaleTerritoryAssignment": [ { "EmployeeAssignmentCode": "3", "EmployeeCode": "EMP003", "SalesTerritoryValue": "HCM", "SalesTerritoryValueName": "Hồ Chí Minh", "SalesTerritoryCode": "MT", "SalesTerritoryLevel": "1", "SalesTerritoryLevelName": "Region", "IsBase": "Y", "EffectiveDate": "2023-07-01T00:00:00Z", "EndDate": "2023-12-01T00:00:00Z" } ] } }
